define: Use this API to retrieve Unpackaged SKU ID information for items that toggle on logistics channel 30029.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

Each result set is returned as a page of entries. Use the \"page_size\" filters to control the maximum number of entries to retrieve per page (i.e., per call). This integer value is used to specify the maximum number of entries to return in a single \"page\" of data. The limit of page_size if between 1 and 48.

","name":"page_size","sample":"2","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"zRbxWiT"},{"description":"
